docs.snippet: LONDON, June 24 (AP). -- Four American Davis Cup players came through their first Wimbledon singles tests today, but four "free lances" from the United States joined Wilmer Allison in the trek to the sidelines.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 24 (AP). -- Four American Davis Cup players came through their first Wimbledon singles tests today, but four "free lances" from the United States joined Wilmer Allison in the trek to the sidelines.

headline.main: Turns Back Countryman.; ALLISON IS BEATEN AT WIMBLEDON NET

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 28. -- Monday has been set as the day for the inauguration of the Chaco peace conference, which will endeavor to arrange a direct agreement between Bolivia and Paraguay for the settlement of their boundary dispute.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 28. -- Monday has been set as the day for the inauguration of the Chaco peace conference, which will endeavor to arrange a direct agreement between Bolivia and Paraguay for the settlement of their boundary dispute.
docs.abstract: ratification by Bolivia and Paraguay noted by mediators; date for parley set; Pres Justo asked to convoke formal conf

headline.main: CHACO PEACE PARLEY WILL START MONDAY; Mediators Recommend Day to Justo -- Fixing of Boundary Line Will Be Chief Task.

docs.snippet: Latin-American countries present a "special opportunity" for German refugee intellectuals and openings already have been found for 100 professors and scientists, Dr. Samuel Guy Inman, special representative of the High Commission for German Refugees,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Latin-American countries present a "special opportunity" for German refugee intellectuals and openings already have been found for 100 professors and scientists, Dr. Samuel Guy Inman, special representative of the High Commission for German Refugees, reported yesterday after a survey of several months in South and Central America.
docs.abstract: repts on survey of Latin-Amer countries as haven for refugees

headline.main: LATIN AMERICA HELD HAVEN FOR REFUGEES; Dr. Inman Says Intellectuals From Germany Are Welcomed in Most Countries There.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 30. -- The Chaco peace conference will open here tomorrow in an atmosphere of optimism in marked contrast with the pessimism that characterized the protracted mediation that arranged the cessation of hostilities.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 30. -- The Chaco peace conference will open here tomorrow in an atmosphere of optimism in marked contrast with the pessimism that characterized the protracted mediation that arranged the cessation of hostilities.
docs.abstract: Plans for conf in Buenos Aires

headline.main: CHICAGO CONFERENCE WILL OPEN TODAY; Delegates of 6 Mediators and of Bolivia and Paraguay to Meet at Peace Parley.

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges moved higher and against the dollar last week. In particular the gold currencies showed the best gains, the French franc, guilder and the Swiss unit selling up to the best levels since mid- March. The belga retraced all the ground...
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges moved higher and against the dollar last week. In particular the gold currencies showed the best gains, the French franc, guilder and the Swiss unit selling up to the best levels since mid- March. The belga retraced all the ground lost in the last several weeks.
docs.abstract: Gold shipments to U S, June and 6 mos

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED JUNE 29, 1935.
